content.question: ​The polynomial function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 x cubed minus 3 x squared minus 23 x plus 12"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>23</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn></math>. Which of the following is true about <math alttext="fraction numerator f open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator x plus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> ?

choices.label: ​The remainder of <math alttext="fraction numerator f open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator x plus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> is <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math>. The quotient of <math alttext="fraction numerator f open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator x plus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> is a quadratic polynomial that factors into two linear factors involving only real numbers.

​The remainder of <math alttext="fraction numerator f open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator x plus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> is <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math>. The quotient of <math alttext="fraction numerator f open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator x plus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> is a quadratic polynomial that does not factor into linear factors involving only real numbers.

​The remainder of <math alttext="fraction numerator f open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator x plus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> is a nonzero constant. The quotient of <math alttext="fraction numerator f open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator x plus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> is a quadratic polynomial that factors into two linear factors involving only real numbers.

​The remainder of <math alttext="fraction numerator f open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator x plus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> is a nonzero constant. The quotient of <math alttext="fraction numerator f open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator x plus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> is a quadratic polynomial that does not factor into linear factors involving only real numbers.

content.answer: ​The remainder of <math alttext="fraction numerator f open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator x plus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> is <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math>. The quotient of <math alttext="fraction numerator f open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator x plus 3 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> is a quadratic polynomial that factors into two linear factors involving only real numbers.

topic.text: 1.11: Equivalent Representations of Polynomial and Rational Expressions

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
